sentences.en: Formal, exact and obstinate, he was also cold, suspicious, touchy and tactless.
sentences.cn: 严肃、严谨、倔强的他同时又冷漠、多疑、敏感、不会变通。

sentences.en: He is a suspicious character.
sentences.cn: 他是个可疑人物.

sentences.en: He made them suspicious when he began acting funny.
sentences.cn: 当他开始故作姿态时,使他们产生了怀疑.

sentences.en: He reported that two suspicious-looking characters had approached Callendar.
sentences.cn: 他报告说两个形迹可疑的人曾跟卡伦德接触过。

sentences.en: He warned the public to be vigilant and report anything suspicious.
sentences.cn: 他警告公众要提高警惕，遇到任何可疑情况都要报告。

sentences.en: He was behaving in a highly suspicious manner.
sentences.cn: 他的举止十分可疑。

sentences.en: His reluctance to answer my questions made me suspicious .
sentences.cn: 他不愿回答我的问题，这引起我的怀疑。

sentences.en: His reluctance to answer my questions made me suspicious.
sentences.cn: 他不愿回答我的问题，这引起我的怀疑。

sentences.en: Manfred, you're a suspicious old devil.
sentences.cn: 曼弗雷德，你是个可疑的老家伙。

sentences.en: Most organizations are, quite understandably, suspicious of new ideas.
sentences.cn: 大多数机构对新想法持怀疑态度，这不难理解。

sentences.en: Nottingham police last night found what they described as a suspicious package.
sentences.cn: 诺丁汉警方昨晚找到了他们声称的可疑包裹。

sentences.en: She gave him a suspicious glance.
sentences.cn: 她向他投去怀疑的一瞥。

sentences.en: She got suspicious and decided to get to the bottom of it.
sentences.cn: 她起了疑惑,便决定弄个水落石出.

sentences.en: Suspicious fans exposed the racket and police arrested a man in Nottingham.
sentences.cn: 起了疑心的爱好者揭发了这一勾当，警察在诺丁汉逮捕了一名男子。

sentences.en: The police inferred that they found her behaviour rather suspicious.
sentences.cn: 警方暗示他们发现她行为非常可疑。

sentences.en: The rabbit is timid and suspicious.
sentences.cn: 兔子胆小而多疑.

sentences.en: There is a suspicious man lurking in the shadows.
sentences.cn: 有一可疑的人躲在阴暗中.

sentences.en: There were one or two suspicious looks from nearby.
sentences.cn: 附近有一两个人投来怀疑的目光。

sentences.en: They became suspicious of his behaviour and contacted the police.
sentences.cn: 他们开始觉得他行为可疑，便报了警。

sentences.en: They found a suspicious package under the seat.
sentences.cn: 他们在座位下发现了一个可疑包裹。

sentences.en: You’ve got a very suspicious mind!
sentences.cn: 你真是疑心太重！

words.tran_cn: 暂停的；悬而不决的；可疑的；暧昧的

trans.tran_cn: 可疑的，猜疑的，怀疑的，多疑的，不信任的，多心
trans.tran_en: thinking that someone might be guilty of doing something wrong or dishonest
